title: Who's the Hottest Female Champion? (Round 1, part 2 of 3)
body:
Hi guys! You might've seen my post yesterday about polls on who's the hottest female champion! The first of 3 sets is over, and we're moving onto the next set! May the hottest girls win this one!

Akali, Katarina, Orianna, Jinx: https://www.strawpoll.me/15437676
Riven, Vayne, Illaoi, Sejuani: https://www.strawpoll.me/15437678
Morgana, Sivir, Anivia, Irelia, Janna: https://www.strawpoll.me/15437680
